title: When you're tearing the enemy team apart as Karthus

replies.body: That's when the phrase "kill yourself" is useful in some cases

{{champion:14}} You called?
{{champion:6}} Tried that. Didn't end well. Somebody please kill me.

I know the feel.

https://40.media.tumblr.com/b2ffb31ca5ca8a5582e39609d1e42318/tumblr_nryh3lpVHp1s7koymo1_500.png
Veigar never seems to be QUITE out of mana, what with his passive, to be fair. You can at least... Drudge out a few more Qs before you waddle off.
Yes but you are very vulnerable during this time, as you only have mana for a single spell before waiting a bit. Risky but useful for farming if you feel like you are safe enough

Agreed.

If you cannot use Event Horizon you're nothing more than a walking bag of gold.

> [{quoted}](name=esmelar,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=lJi6LNIJ,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-03-18T00:15:29.428+0000)
>
> {{champion:30}} I don't need mana to take your life mortal! (Starts AA'ing)
> {{champion:412}} what are you doing? Are you dancing? Stop you look silly
> {{champion:30}} {{item:3070}}

But if he was crying a tear he would have mana
haha, You got it!

i r geeneus
nvm

> (Starts AA'ing)

Wait I thought his AA costs mana?
tbh that should be a thing for someone.
Fishbones says hi! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
{{champion:30}} woops, out of mana. Time to Ult with my death passive :L
I've had a Karthus rage at me for saving his life. He was oom and in the middle of the enemy team.

>

If his words where something along the lines of   

(EzraTwitch): TAHM!  
(EzraTwitch): STOP saving me

90% sure that was me.
But i WANTED to die.
Welp, shouldn't have removed mana pots from the game. *weeps*
they nerfed {{champion:86}} , but at least {{item:3508}} is helping him out

Ah, yes...
that guy...
...If only there were a champion who benefited from moving around and stop your Ult from killing low health players...


...{{champion:203}} ...

Yah, after mana pots were removed everyone got a buff but him. {{champion:30}} 

{{summoner:13}}  you were so good but now you are gone.
NYEH HEH HEH HEH - AW, OVER ALREADY!?!?!
Damn, I forgot how genuinely terrifying the lich was in that show O_O
Mr. Malicious i could use your help creating a Discussion in creation forums involving Mord but im not good with words.
